about_the_game:
Your soul has been resurrected by the Jester God, and you must embark on a journey where humor intertwines with darkness in this whimsical yet perilous journey.

Game Features:
Unique Narrative: Play as a lost soul, chosen by the Jester God, on a mission to gather souls across various realms
Dynamic Combat and Progression: Battle knights and sacred bosses, with each victory propelling you closer to your mission and expanding your arsenal, with more abilities for the challenges that lie ahead.
Roguelike Exploration:
Experience an endless amount of levels designed to create a fair yet unpredictable adventure.
Multiplayer: Enjoy a seamlessly integrated multiplayer experience.

name: PURSUIT OF LAUGHTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Your spirit has been reawakened by the Jester God and you must embark on a journey where humor and darkness intertwine, navigate mysteries with laughter as your guide in a world where whimsy shadows logic.
